name: Yuki Katamari
description:
In Yuki Katamari (Translation: Snow Clump), you are an ever-growing snowball that wants nothing but envelop the entire world in your icy embrace.

The game features a Golf-with-Friends-style control, allowing you to slingshot yourself wherever you please.

- Roll around the snow to get bigger! As you grow, objects will become stickable, allowing you to absorb them.

- Pick up power-ups to boost your progress.

- Avoid the flaming balls! They will melt you with their toasty aura.

Controls:

Hold left click and drag to aim, release to launch.

Press esc to pause/unpause the game.

Yuki Katamari is made as part of the ACM Studio Snowjam event in 48 hours. Certain assets are imported, and due credit is given in the Credits page of the game.
